#TITLE Flowers Blooming in the Church
#ALBUM Final Fantasy VII
#COMPOSER Nobuo Uematsu
#ARRANGED Gi Nattak

#WAVE 0x20 0x5E ## flute (FF6)
#WAVE 0x21 0x0A ## oboe (FF6)
#WAVE 0x22 0x1B ## harp (FF6)

{1}
l16t76%v50%e1%b0,70%f0,0 $1 v60p60|0o4r1  ^1  ^1  <c+8e8a1  
v50,0^8v60r8g8e8>b1  v50,0^8v60r4<c+8e8a4g+8  b4a4f+8g+8m48,18,201e4  
^8>v200,0b1  mv60r8<c+8e8a1  v50,0^8v60r8g8e8>b1  
v50,0^8v60r8m48,18,201a2^4  ma+4^8a4^8m48,18,201g+1  v100,0^4^8m[15r1  
]r2v50<a4^8g+4  ^8f+4^8e2  ^4c+2v100,0^4  v50r1  
^1  ^1  ^4^8a4^8g+4  ^8f+4^8e2  
^4>b2^4  r1  ^2<f+8e8d8a2  ^4d4f+8m48,18,201e1  
v200,0^1  ^8mr2^4^8  
;1

l16%e1 $3 p64|2o5r4v60a4^8v40a4^8  v30a4^8v20a4^8v60a4
